skills.name: From Fire
skills.effect: Deals medium single target damage. 3 hits.Uses weapon’s element.Heals self by 20% if the target Burns

skills.name: Lumière Assault
skills.effect: Deals low single target damage. 5 hits.Uses weapon’s element.Critical Hits generate 1 additional Charge

skills.name: Marking Shot
skills.effect: Deals low single target Lightning damage. 1 hit.Applies Mark

skills.name: Overcharge
skills.effect: Deals high single target Lightning damage based on the amount of Charges 1 hit.Can BreakResets Charges

skills.name: Powerful
skills.effect: Applies Powerful to 1-3 allies, increasing the damage they deal for 3 turns.Gives 0 to 2 Charges

skills.name: Recovery
skills.effect: Recovers 50% Health and dispels Status Effects.Gives 0 to 2 Charges

skills.name: Shatter
skills.effect: Deals High Lightning damage to all enemies. 1 hit.Can BreakIf a target is Broken by the hit, Overcharge is fully Charged

skills.name: Strike Storm
skills.effect: Deals very high single target damage. 6 hits.Uses weapon’s element.Critical Hits generate 2 additional Charges

skills.name: Breaking Rules
skills.effect: Deals low single target Physical damage. 2 hits.Destroys all target’s Shields Gains 1 AP per Shield destroyed.If target is Defenceless, play a second turn.

skills.name: Burning Canvas
skills.effect: Deals high single target Void damage. 5 hits.Applies 1 Burn per hit. Damage increased for each Burn on the target.

skills.name: Combustion
skills.effect: Deals medium single target Physical Damage. 2 hits.Consumes up to 10 Burn for increased damage.

skills.name: Degagement
skills.effect: Deals low single target Fire damage. 1 hit.Target becomes weak to Fire damage for 2 turns

skills.name: Égide
skills.effect: Protects allies by taking damage in their place, for 2 turns.Duration is extended by 1 on gaining Shell.

skills.name: Fencer's Flurry
skills.effect: Deals medium damage to all enemies. 1 hit.Uses weapon’s element.Applies Defenceless for 1 turn.

skills.name: Fleuret Fury
skills.effect: Deals high single target Physical damage. 3 hits.If in Virtuose Stance, stay in Virtuose Stance.Can Break.

skills.name: Gommage
skills.effect: Kills weak targets.Otherwise deals extreme Void damage. 1 hit.

skills.name: Gustave's Homage
skills.effect: Deals high single target Lightning damage. 8 hits.Increased damage to Marked targets.Doesn’t remove Mark.

skills.name: Guard Down
skills.effect: Applies Defenceless to all enemies for 3 turns.

skills.name: Guard Up
skills.effect: Applies Shell, reducing damage taken, to up to 3 allies for 3 turns.

skills.name: Last Chance
skills.effect: Reduces self-Health to 1 but refills all AP.Switches to Virtuose Stance.

skills.name: Mezzo Forte
skills.effect: Reapplies current stance and gives 2-4 AP.

skills.name: Momentum Strike
skills.effect: Deals high single target damage. 1 hit.Uses weapon’s element.Increased damage to Marked targets.Virtuose Stance: Costs 4 AP.

skills.name: Offensive Switch
skills.effect: Deals low single target damage and applies Defenceless for 3 turns. 1 hit.Uses weapon’s element.

skills.name: Payback
skills.effect: Deals very high single target Physical damage. 1 hit.Reduced AP cost for each attack parried since last turn.Can Break.

skills.name: Percée
skills.effect: Deals medium single target Physical damage. 1 hit.Increased damage to Marked targets.Virtuose Stance: Costs 2 AP.

skills.name: Phantom Strike
skills.effect: Deals very high Void damage to all enemies. 4 hits.Also gives +35% of a Gradient Charge.

skills.name: Phoenix Flame
skills.effect: Applies 10 Burn to all enemies and revives all allies with 50 to 70% Health.

skills.name: Pyrolyse
skills.effect: Deals extreme single target Fire damage. 3 hits.Applies 5 Burn per hit.Offensive Stance: Applies 2 more Burn per hit.

skills.name: Rain of Fire
skills.effect: Deals medium single target Fire damage. 2 hits.Applies 3 Burn per hit.Defensive Stance: applies 2 more Burn per hit.

skills.name: Revenge
skills.effect: Deals high single target Fire damage. 1 hit.Damage increased for each hit received since the previous turn.Can Break.

skills.name: Spark
skills.effect: Deals low single target Fire damage. 1 hit.Applies 3 Burn.Offensive Stance: Applies 2 more Burn.

skills.name: Stendhal
skills.effect: Deals extreme single target Void damage. 1 hit.Removes self-Shields and self applies Defenceless.

skills.name: Swift Stride
skills.effect: Deals low single target Physical damage. 1 hit.Switches to Virtuose Stance if target is Burning.Regains 0 to 2 AP.

skills.effect: Deals extreme single target damage. 5 hits.Uses weapon’s element.Critical Hits deal double damage.

skills.name: Virtuose Strike
skills.effect: Deals high single target Physical damage. 5 hits.

skills.name: All Set
skills.effect: Applies Shell, Powerful, and Rush to all allies.

skills.effect: Deals low Dark damage to all enemies. 2 hits.Applies 2 Foretell per hit.

skills.name: Dark Wave
skills.effect: Deals high Dark damage to all enemies. 3 hits.Consumes all Foretell for increased damage.

skills.name: Dark Cleansing

skills.name: Delaying Slash

skills.name: Doom

skills.name: End Slice
skills.effect: Deals extreme single target Physical damage. 1 hit.Damage is increased for each Foretell consumed since the beginning of the battle.

skills.name: Firing Shadow
skills.effect: Deals low Dark damage to all enemies. 3 hits.Consumes 1 Foretell per hit for increased damage.

skills.name: Fortune's Fury
skills.effect: Targeted ally deals double damage for 1 turn.

skills.effect: Deals medium single target Dark damage. 1 hit.Heals all allies by 30% Health.Consumes Foretell to increase Heal by 5% per Foretell.

skills.name: Harvest
skills.effect: Deals medium single target damage. 1 hit.Uses weapon’s element.Heals self by 40% Health.Consumes all Foretell to increase Heal by 5% per Foretell.

skills.name: Intervention

skills.name: Phantom Blade
skills.effect: Deals high single target Dark damage. 1 hit.Consumes all Foretell to deal additional damage.Can Break.

skills.name: Rush

skills.effect: Deals very high Fire damage that applies 5 Burn per hit to all enemies. 2 hits.Deals self-damage if failed.Consumes Stains for Greatly increased damage.

skills.effect: Consumes all Stains to deal high elemental damage to the target.Can Break if 4 Stains are consumed.
